en.additional_description: This system ensures a structured and regulated collaborative environment, allowing precise control over user roles and interactions.

confirmations.confirmed: Your email address has been successfully confirmed.
confirmations.send_instructions: You will receive an email with instructions for how to confirm your email address in a few minutes.
confirmations.send_paranoid_instructions: If your email address exists in our database, you will receive an email with instructions for how to confirm your email address in a few minutes.

failure.inactive: Your account is not activated yet.
failure.last_attempt: You have one more attempt before your account is locked.
failure.timeout: Your session expired. Please sign in again to continue.
failure.unauthenticated: You need to sign in or sign up before continuing.
failure.unconfirmed: You have to confirm your email address before continuing.

omniauth_callbacks.failure: Could not authenticate you from %{kind} because "%{reason}".

passwords.no_token: You can't access this page without coming from a password reset email. If you do come from a password reset email, please make sure you used the full URL provided.
passwords.send_instructions: You will receive an email with instructions on how to reset your password in a few minutes.
passwords.send_paranoid_instructions: If your email address exists in our database, you will receive a password recovery link at your email address in a few minutes.
passwords.updated: Your password has been changed successfully. You are now signed in.
passwords.updated_not_active: Your password has been changed successfully.

registrations.destroyed: Bye! Your account has been successfully cancelled. We hope to see you again soon.
registrations.signed_up: Welcome! You have signed up successfully.
registrations.signed_up_but_inactive: You have signed up successfully. However, we could not sign you in because your account is not yet activated.
registrations.signed_up_but_locked: You have signed up successfully. However, we could not sign you in because your account is locked.
registrations.signed_up_but_unconfirmed: A message with a confirmation link has been sent to your email address. Please follow the link to activate your account.
registrations.update_needs_confirmation: You updated your account successfully, but we need to verify your new email address. Please check your email and follow the confirmation link to confirm your new email address.
registrations.updated: Your account has been updated successfully.
registrations.updated_but_not_signed_in: Your account has been updated successfully, but since your password was changed, you need to sign in again.

unlocks.send_instructions: You will receive an email with instructions for how to unlock your account in a few minutes.
unlocks.send_paranoid_instructions: If your account exists, you will receive an email with instructions for how to unlock it in a few minutes.
unlocks.unlocked: Your account has been unlocked successfully. Please sign in to continue.

en.general_description: Our platform is a visually rich, interactive, and highly configurable collaborative whiteboard. It offers advanced object customization and comprehensive access control, making it a powerful tool for structured collaboration.
en.key_feature_1_text: A dynamic interface designed for intuitive user experience.
en.key_feature_2_text: Objects can be extensively configured, including nesting and grouping.
en.key_feature_3_text: Users can set permissions for objects viewing and editing.

critical_error.reload_message: The page will be reloaded in a 10 seconds. If it doesn't, please refresh the page manually
critical_error.title: Critical Error!

can_assign_admin.description: Allows the user to assign and change admin roles
can_assign_admin.label: Can assign admin

can_change_roles.description: Allows the user to change general roles
can_change_roles.label: Can change roles

can_edit.description: Allows the user to edit the board
can_edit.label: Can edit

can_ignore_rules.description: Allows the user to ignore rules
can_ignore_rules.label: Can ignore rules
